title: Help needed with new client
body:
http://imgur.com/a/ifzlv
how do i join/ inv my friend, on the old client i could just go to the right and inv them

replies.body: If you haven't uninstalled and reinstalled yet Press "Ctrl" + "- / down arrow". Let us know if you experience the cut off again.

Hey there,

You appear to be in the post-game lobby. You need to be in a pre-queue lobby to invite people.
the problem of the social tab being cut off hasn't been addressed, i may not be able to inv but i also cant be invited
Click the cog to the top right of the client and click "Initiate Full Repair". After the repair, let us know the results.
i should have stated this but, the cog is the part being cut off

i close the client and reopen and that fixes the problem for a day, perhaps its a bug?
http://imgur.com/a/lzQe0
It's likely due to corrupt files in your installation since this issue hasn't been reported by anybody else.
